title: Memory Game Project
goal: This project is memory game where the images change position each time one is clicked. Each click adds to your score but if you click the same image twice the score resets and your top score is recorded.
tech: This project was built with React and the site is hosted on Github Pages.

image.imgAlt: Memory game where the images are of various small metal gears.

title: Responsive Design Project
goal: The goal of this project was to create a duplicate of TheNextWeb.com to replicate their responsive design. This was great practice making elements disapear, re-arrange, and introduce new elements at a smaller window size such as the hamburger menu.
tech: This was built with just HTML and CSS. The site is hosted on Github Pages.

title: Shopping Cart Project
goal: This site includes a splash page, a products page, a checkout page, and a dynamically created page for each of the store items.
tech: This was built with React and the site is hosted on Github Pages.

image.imgAlt: Fictional brick walls for sale from the Shopping Cart project
